recordTypes.name: Application for Opt-Out of Services by Other Means
recordTypes.description: Application for Opt-Out of Services by Other Means

recordTypes.name: Application to Opt-In for Curbside Services
recordTypes.description: Opt-in Trash Services

recordTypes.name: Application for Seasonal Solid Waste Services
Rental Registration
recordTypes.description: Rental properties are required to be registered and inspected by the Wareham Health Department on a yearly basis.  Rental registrations for 2025 are now open and due by January 31, 2025.

recordTypes.name: Parking Ticket Appeal
recordTypes.description: Parking Ticket Appeal

recordTypes.name: Building Permit
recordTypes.description: This application is used for new construction, renovations, alterations, house demolition/ interior demolition,  deck construction and repairs, pool installation and any major repairs to existing homes and buildings including commercial, and one and two family buildings.

recordTypes.name: Recreational Camps
recordTypes.description: Recreational Camps for Children licenses licenses are renewable annually on June 1st.

recordTypes.name: Body Art Facility
recordTypes.description: Licenses are valid through Dec. 31 in the year of issue and must be renewed annually before Jan 1.

recordTypes.name: Building Permit - Short Form
recordTypes.description:
This application is used for MINOR work ONLY. **Ex: ROOFING, WINDOWS/DOORS, SIDING, ETC.**

**DO NOT USE THIS APPLICATION FOR ANY WORK INVOLVING DIGGING.***

***DO NOT USE FOR HOUSE DEMOLITION, ADDITIONS, ADU's, OR  NEW CONSTRUCTION. *** APPLICATIONS WILL BE REJECTED IF SUBMITTED INCORRECTYLY.

recordTypes.name: RDA - Request for Determination of Applicability
Common Victualler License
recordTypes.description: A Common Victualler's license is governed by Massachusetts General Law Title 20, Chapter 140 Section 21E.  Any establishment that cooks, prepares, and serves food and provides seating for immediate consumption is required to have a Common Victualler license.  This is an annual permit issued under the authority of the Select Board and is valid from January 1 to December 31st of a calendar year.

recordTypes.name: Event Application
Buildings/ Structures UNDER 200 sq. ft. - Zoning Review Application
recordTypes.description: This application is used for zoning review for an detached buildings/structures under 200 sq. ft. (Sheds, carports, pergolas, etc.)

recordTypes.name: Body Art Practitioner
recordTypes.description: Licenses are valid through Dec. 31 in the year of issue and must be renewed annually before Jan 1.

recordTypes.name: Complaint Form - (Building/Zoning)
recordTypes.description: Please use this form to submit a  Zoning and/or Building complaint for any property in the Town of Wareham. Enter a complaint regarding the following issues: abandoned properties, building code issues, business use of home, construction site nuisance, fences, illegal rentals (apartments/short term), light trespass, noise, overgrown properties, unsafe structures, water runoff, work without permits, zoning issues.

recordTypes.name: Car Dealership Licenses (Class I, II, III)
AOOC - Amended Order of Conditions Request
Change of Occupancy/Change of Use
recordTypes.description: Please complete this form for a Change of Occupant or for a Change of Use for a business located in the Town of Wareham. This application is only for a Change of Occupant or Change of Use.  A separate Building Permit application will be required to make any changes to the space in accordance with MA State Building Code 780 CMR (9th Edition).

recordTypes.name: Food Handlers Certificate
recordTypes.description: Food Handlers Certificates are renewed at the beginning of April every year.

recordTypes.name: Food Service Establishment Permit
recordTypes.description: Licenses are valid through Dec. 31 in the year of issue and must be renewed annually before Jan 1.

recordTypes.name: Electrical Permit
recordTypes.description: This permit is required when installing any electrical wiring, electrical appliances, electrical services, etc.  Also includes low voltage wiring including cable TV, internet, phones, security alarm systems, etc. You must be a licensed professional to apply for this permit.

recordTypes.name: Electrical Permit (Low Voltage)
recordTypes.description: This permit is required ONLY when installing low voltage wiring including cable TV/ home entertainment wiring, networking/data wires, phone wires, etc.

recordTypes.name: Lodging Permit
recordTypes.description: Licenses are valid through Dec. 31 in the year of issue and must be renewed annually before Jan 1.

recordTypes.name: Second Hand Dealer/ Junk Dealer Permit
recordTypes.description:
Secondhand/Junk Dealer Licenses are governed by Massachusetts General Law, ch. 140, sec. 54-56.

You must apply for a Secondhand/Junk Dealer License if you plan to solicit, be a collector of, or a dealer in antiques, secondhand goods and/or junk in the Town of Wareham.

recordTypes.name: Gas Permit
recordTypes.description: This permit is required when natural gas/propane gas piping is installed, altered, added to or repaired, including the installation of gas fired appliances. You must be a licensed professional to apply for this permit.

recordTypes.name: Mechanical Permit
recordTypes.description: This permit is required to erect, install, enlarge, alter, do major repairs, remove, convert or replace a mechanical system.  The property owner or owner’s agent can apply for this permit.  This permit is issued by the Building Inspector.

recordTypes.name: Mobile Food Service Permit
recordTypes.description: Licenses are valid through Dec. 31 in the year of issue and must be renewed annually before Jan 1.

recordTypes.name: Plumbing Permit
recordTypes.description: This permit is required anytime the building’s plumbing is being installed, altered, removed, replaced or repaired.  You must be a licensed professional to apply for this permit.

recordTypes.name: Sheet Metal Permit
recordTypes.description: This permit is required when a sheet metal worker is manufacturing, fabricating, assembling, handling, erecting, installing, dismantling, alteration and/or repairing duct work, commercial fans, kitchen hoods and vents, architectural sheet metal and metal roofing.

recordTypes.name: Residential Kitchen Permit
recordTypes.description: Licenses are valid through Dec. 31 in the year of issue and must be renewed annually before Jan 1.

recordTypes.name: Sign Permit
recordTypes.description: This permit is required to erect, install, enlarge, alter, repair, remove, replace, convert signage. Sign permits for an in home (residential) occupation/business may be pulled by the owner, or the owners agent, provided that the address of the business is the owners primary residence. Sign permits for business located in a commercial space(s), must be pulled by a licensed and insured contractor. This permit is issued by the Building Inspector.

recordTypes.name: State Certificate of Inspection
recordTypes.description: Complete this form for new applications and renewal of State Certificate of Inspection. MA State Building Code, Sec 110.7, table 110.

recordTypes.name: Retail Food Establishment Permit
recordTypes.description: Licenses are valid through Dec. 31 in the year of issue and must be renewed annually before Jan 1.

recordTypes.name: Septic Haulers
recordTypes.description: Pumpers/Haulers licenses are renewable annually.

recordTypes.name: Commercial Solid Waste Hauler
recordTypes.description: Application is for solid waste haulers servicing Commercial properties. Starting April 1, 2021 only 1 residential solid waste hauler is licensed in Wareham

recordTypes.name: Trench Permit
recordTypes.description: This permit is required anytime a trench hole or other excavation is being done to a depth of 3 (three) feet or more.  If this application is in connection with a road opening permit, please attach copy of road opening permit.

recordTypes.name: Septic Installer
recordTypes.description: Disposal Works Installers licenses are renewable annually on January 1st

recordTypes.name: Stable
recordTypes.description: Stable licenses are renewable annually on August 1st

recordTypes.name: Swimming Pool Permit
recordTypes.description: Application for permit to operate a public, semi-public swimming pool, or wading pool.

recordTypes.name: Tanning
recordTypes.description: Tanning licenses are renewable annually on March 1st

recordTypes.name: Tobacco & Nicotine Sales Permit
recordTypes.description: Tobacco Sales licenses are valid through Dec. 31 in the year of issue and must be renewed annually before Jan 1.

Town of Wareham

categories.name: Planning / Zoning
categories.content: Welcome to the Planning and Community Development Electronic Application Portal.
